moves.3... cxd4 4. Nxd4: normal trade brings knight to the centar
moves.5... g6: preparing another fianchetto bish gotta b careful
moves.7. Be3: develop and defend thats my motto
moves.8... Nxe4 9. Nxe4 Bxe4: bad trade for me loses a pawn but opens the center
moves.10. O-O-O: castles oppsite side to opponent(expects) to prepare pawn storm
moves.10... Bxg2: damn another pawn goes but opens file for rooks on kingside
moves.13... e6 14. Bxg7: opens pin on pawn and weakens king
moves.19. Bd3: attacks bish to clear it and open line to g6 for queen
moves.19... f5: blocks pawn storm damn but makes his king side pawns static to
